results.title: Evaluation of metformin's effect on the adult and juvenile stages of Schistosoma mansoni: an in-vitro study.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ might be a potential drug either alone or as an adjuvant to @CHEMICAL_Praziquantel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011223 @@@PZQ@@@ for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Schistosomiasis_mansoni</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012555 @@@schistosomiasis mansoni@@@ and warrant its further assessment in animal models of disease.

citations.NLM: Abdel Menaem HN, Hanafy MA, Abou El Dahab M, Mohamed KESK. Evaluation of metformin's effect on the adult and juvenile stages of Schistosoma mansoni: an in-vitro study. J Parasit Dis. 2025 Mar;49(1):69-83. PMID: 39975621
citations.BibTeX: @article{39975621, title={Evaluation of metformin's effect on the adult and juvenile stages of Schistosoma mansoni: an in-vitro study.}, author={Abdel Menaem HN and Hanafy MA and Abou El Dahab M and Mohamed KESK}, journal={J Parasit Dis}, volume={49}, number={1}, pages={69-83}}

results.title: An adjuvant effect of Metformin as an anti-fibrotic agent when administered with the anti-schistosomal Praziquantel in Schistosoma mansoni infected mice.
results.text_hl: Treatment of S. mansoni-infected @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Praziquantel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011223 @@@PZQ@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ ameliorated the hematological and biochemical alterations induced by @<m>DISEASE_Schistosomiasis_mansoni</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012555 @@@S. mansoni infection@@@.

citations.NLM: Salama WM, El-Naggar SA, Harras SF, El-Said KS. An adjuvant effect of Metformin as an anti-fibrotic agent when administered with the anti-schistosomal Praziquantel in Schistosoma mansoni infected mice. Trop Biomed. 2021 Jun 1;38(2):205-213. PMID: 34172712
citations.BibTeX: @article{34172712, title={An adjuvant effect of Metformin as an anti-fibrotic agent when administered with the anti-schistosomal Praziquantel in Schistosoma mansoni infected mice.}, author={Salama WM and El-Naggar SA and Harras SF and El-Said KS}, journal={Trop Biomed}, volume={38}, number={2}, pages={205-213}}
